tuv.seg: Liability of carriers of passengers by sea in the European Union
Dliteanas iompróirí paisinéirí ar muir san Aontas Eorpach
The International Maritime Organization (IMO) is the United Nations agency with responsibility for the safety and security of shipping and the prevention of marine pollution by ships

Is iad an Eagraíocht Mhuirí Idirnáisiúnta (IMO) an ghníomhaireacht de chuid na Náisiún Aontaithe atá freagrach as sábháilteacht agus slándáil na loingseoireachta agus as cosc a chur ar thruailliú muirí ag longa
In 1974 the IMO adopted the Athens Convention relating to the Carriage of Passengers and their Luggage by Sea which entered into force in 1987
I 1974, ghlac an IMO le Coinbhinsiún na hAithine maidir le hIompar Paisinéirí agus a gCuid Bagáiste ar Muir a tháinig i bhfeidhm i 1987
The Convention established a regime of liability for damage suffered by passengers carried on a seagoing vessel
Bhunaigh an Coinbhinsiún córas dliteanais do dhamáistí a mbíonn paisinéirí a iompraítear ar árthach farraige thíos leo
It declares a carrier liable for damage or loss suffered by a passenger if the incident causing the damage occurred in the course of the carriage and was due to the fault or neglect of the carrier

Dearbhaítear go bhfuil dliteanas ar iompróir íoc as damáiste nó caillteanas a mbíonn paisinéir thíos leis má tharla an teagmhas a bhí ina chúis leis an damáiste le linn iompair agus más é locht nó faillí an iompróra ba chúis leis
In 2002 a Protocol to amend the Athens Convention was adopted which introduced compulsory insurance to cover passengers on ships and raised the limits on liability
In 2002, glacadh le Prótacal chun Coinbhinsiún na hAithine a thug isteach árachas éigeantach chun paisinéirí ar longa a chumhdach agus rinne seo na teorainneacha ar dhliteanas a ardú
In 2006 the Legal Committee of the IMO adopted guidelines for the implementation of the amended Athens Convention
In 2006, ghlac Coiste Dlíthiúil an IMO le treoirlínte do chur i bhfeidhm Choinbhinsiún leasaithe na hAithine
The 2006 Guidelines includes wording for a reservation that allows the limitation of liability for claims in respect of war or terrorism
Áirítear le treoirlínte 2006, foclaíocht d’áirithint a cheadaíonn teorannú dliteanais d’éilimh maidir le cogadh nó sceimhlitheoireacht
The 2002 Protocol came into force in April 2014 and with respect to Ireland on 7 November 2014
Tháinig an Prótacal 2002 i bhfeidhm i mí Aibreáin 2014 agus maidir le hÉirinn ar an 7 Samhain 2014
The liability limits are set in Special Drawing Rights (SDR) which is a mix of currency values established by the International Monetary Fund (IMF)
Leagtar amach na teorainneacha dliteanais i gCearta Speisialta Tarraingthe (SDR) atá ina mheascán de luachanna airgeadra arna bhunú ag an gCiste Airgeadaíochta Idirnáisiúnta (IMF)
The current value of an SDR in euro is available on the IMF's website
Tá fáil ar luach reatha an SDR in Euro ar láithreán gréasáin an IMF
Regulation 392/2009 on the liability of carriers of passengers by sea in the event of accidents applies in all European Union (EU) and EEA (Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway) member states
Tá feidhm ag Rialachán 392/2009 ar dhliteanas iompróirí paisinéirí ar muir i gcás timpistí i ngach Ballstát den Aontas Eorpach (AE) agus den LEE (an Íoslainn, Lichtinstéin, an Iorua)
The Regulation lays down a regime of liability and insurance for the carriage of passengers by sea, based on:
Leagann an Rialachán córas dliteanais agus árachais síos d’iompar paisinéirí ar muir, bunaithe ar an méid a leanas:
• The Athens Convention as amended by the 2002 Protocol and
• Coinbhinsiún na hAithine arna leasú ag Prótacal 2002, agus
• The IMO 2006 Guidelines
• Treoirlínte 2006 an IMO
The Regulation applies to all international voyages where:
Baineann an Rialachán le gach aistear idirnáisiúnta:
• The ship is flying the flag of or is registered in a member state or
• Ina bhfuil brat ballstáit ar crochadh ag an long nó ina bhfuil an long cláraithe i mBallstát, nó
• The contract of carriage has been signed in a member state or
• Inar síníodh an conradh iompair i mBallstát, nó
• The place of departure or destination, according to the contract of carriage, is situated within a member state
• Ina bhfuil an áit imeachta nó an ceann scríbe, i gcomhréir leis an gconradh iompair, lonnaithe laistigh de Bhallstát
The Regulation also applies to certain categories of passenger ships engaged in domestic seagoing voyages
Ina theannta sin, baineann an Rialachán le catagóirí áirithe longa paisinéirí a thugann faoi aistir intíre farraige
A member state can defer application of the Regulation to such ships for at least 4 years
Féadfaidh Ballstát feidhmiú an Rialacháin a iarchur ar na longa siúd ar feadh ar a laghad 4 bliana
It may also apply it to all domestic sea-going voyages
Ina theannta sin, féadfaidh siad é a chur i bhfeidhm ar gach aistear farraige intíre
Death or injury to passengers
Bás nó gortú paisinéirí
Where loss is suffered as a result of the death of or personal injury to a passenger caused by a shipping incident the carrier is strictly liable up to 250,000 SDRs

Sa chás go mbíonn duine thíos le caillteanas mar thoradh ar bhás nó gortú pearsanta do phaisinéir a raibh timpiste loingseoireachta ina húdar léi, is é an t-iompróir ar a bhfuil an diandliteanas chun a mhéid le 250,000 SDR a íoc
A shipping incident is a shipwreck, capsizing, collision or stranding of the ship, explosion or fire in the ship, or defect in the ship
Is ionann teagmhas loingseoireachta agus briseadh loinge, iompú béal faoi, tuairt nó tráchur na loinge, pléascadh nó dóiteán sa long, nó locht ar an long
If the loss or damage is more than 250,000 SDRs, the carrier is further liable up to a limit of 400,000 SDRs unless the carrier can prove it was not at fault
Más ionann agus breis agus 250,000 SDR an damáiste, beidh breis dliteanais ar an iompróir 400,000 SDR, ar a mhéid, a íoc murar féidir leis an iompróir a chruthú nach iadsan ba chúis leis
If the loss is not as a result of a shipping incident, the carrier is liable up to a limit of 400,000 SDRs, if the claimant can prove fault or negligence on the part of the carrier

Mura bhfuil an caillteanas mar thoradh ar theagmhas loingseoireachta, beidh dliteanas ar an iompróir 400,000 SDR, ar a mhéid, a íoc, más féidir leis an éilitheoir locht nó faillí ar pháirt an iompróra a chruthú
The carrier and passenger may agree to a higher limit
Féadfaidh an t-iompróir agus an paisinéir comhaontú a dhéanamh ar theorainn níos airde
If the loss suffered is the result of war or terrorism, liability is limited to the lower of 250,000 SDRs per passenger or 340 million SDRs per ship

Má bhíonn an caillteanas a rabhthas thíos leis ina thoradh ar chogadh nó ar sceimhlitheoireacht, bíonn teorainn ar an dliteanas go dtí an teorainn níos ísle 250,000 SDR in aghaidh an phaisinéara nó 340 milliún SDR in aghaidh na loinge
Where a death or personal injury is caused by a shipping incident, the carrier must make an advance payment within 15 days to cover immediate economic needs, proportionate to the damages suffered

Sa chás go mbíonn teagmhas loingseoireachta ina chúis le bás nó gortú pearsanta, ní mór don iompróir réamhíocaíocht a dhéanamh laistigh de 15 lá chun íoc as na riachtanais láithreacha gheilleagracha, a bheidh i gcomhréir leis na damáistí a rabhthas thíos leo
In the case of a death the minimum payment is €21,000
I gcás báis, is ionann an íocaíocht íosta agus €21,000
The advance payment is not an admission of liability
Ní admháil dliteanais an réamhíocaíocht
The carrier is liable for the loss of or damage to cabin luggage where the loss is due to the fault or neglect of the carrier
Tá an t-iompróir faoi dhliteanas íoc as caillteanas bagáiste cábáin nó as díobháil a rinneadh do bhagáiste cábáin, sa chás go mbíonn locht nó faillí an iompróra ina chúis leis an gcaillteanas
The fault or neglect of the carrier is presumed in the case of a shipping incident
Meastar gurbh é locht nó faillí an iompróra a bhí i gceist i gcás timpiste loingseoireachta
The carrier’s liability for cabin luggage is limited to 2,250 SDRs per passenger
Leagtar teorainn 2,250 SDR ar dhliteanas an iompróra i leith bagáiste cábáin, in aghaidh an phaisinéara
The carrier is presumed liable for the loss of or damage to luggage other than cabin luggage unless the carrier can prove that the loss is not due to the fault or neglect of the carrier

Meastar go mbíonn an t-iompróir faoi dhliteanas íoc as caillteanas bagáiste nó díobháil a rinneadh do bhagáiste, murar féidir leis an iompróir a chruthú nach locht nó faillí an iompróra ba chúis leis an gcaillteanas
The carrier’s liability is limited as follows:
Tá dliteanas an iompróra teoranta don mhéid a leanas:
• For the loss of or damage to vehicles including all luggage carried in or on the vehicle the limit is 12,700 SDRs per vehicle
• Caillteanas feithiclí agus díobháil a rinneadh d’fheithiclí, lena n-áirítear an bagáiste go léir a iompraíodh ar an bhfeithicil nó san fheithicil: teorainn 12,700 SDR in aghaidh na feithicle
• For the loss of or damage to other luggage the limit is 3,375 SDRs per passenger
• Caillteanas bagáiste nó díobháil a rinneadh do bhagáiste: teorainn 3,375 SDR in aghaidh an phaisinéara
The carrier and the passenger may agree to set higher liability limits
Féadfaidh an t-iompróir agus an paisinéir comhaontú a dhéanamh ar theorainneacha dliteanais níos airde a shocrú
The carrier and the passenger may also agree that the liability of the carrier will be subject to a deductible that will be deducted from the compensation
Ina theannta sin, féadfaidh an t-iompróir agus an paisinéir comhaontú a dhéanamh go mbeidh dliteanas an iompróra faoi réir asbhaintigh a asbhainfear ón gcúiteamh
The deductible cannot exceed:
Ní féidir leis an asbhainteach an méid a leanas a shárú:
• In the case of damage to a vehicle - 330 SDRs
• I gcás damáiste a dhéanamh d’fheithicil – 330 SDR
• In the case of loss of or damage to other luggage - 149 SDRs per passenger
• I gcás caillteanas bagáiste nó díobháil a dhéanamh do bhagáiste eile – 149 SDR in aghaidh an phaisinéara
The carrier is not liable for the loss of or damage to monies, jewellery, works of art, or other valuables, unless they have been deposited with the carrier for safe-keeping

Níl an t-iompróir faoi dhliteanas íoc as caillteanas nó díobháil a dhéanamh d’airgead, seodra, saothair ealaíne nó as earraí luachmhara eile, murar cuireadh i dtaisce iad leis an iompróir ar mhaithe lena slánchoimeád
If they have been deposited, the limit of 3,375 SDRs per passenger apply
Má rinneadh iad a chur i dtaisce, beidh feidhm ag an teorainn 3,375 SDR in aghaidh an phaisinéara
Loss or damage to mobility equipment
Caillteanas nó díobháil a dhéanamh do threalamh soghluaiseachta

The carrier is liable for the loss of or damage to mobility equipment, or other specific equipment used by a passenger with reduced mobility, where the loss is due to the fault or neglect of the carrier

Tá an t-iompróir faoi dhliteanas íoc as caillteanas trealamh soghluaiseachta nó as díobháil a rinneadh do threalamh soghluaiseachta, nó do threalamh sonrach eile a úsáideann paisinéir ag a bhfuil soghluaiseacht laghdaithe, sa chás go mbíonn locht nó faillí an iompróra ina chúis leis an gcaillteanas
The fault or neglect of the carrier is presumed in the case of a shipping incident
Meastar gurbh é locht nó faillí an iompróra a bhí i gceist i gcás timpiste loingseoireachta
The passenger is entitled to the replacement value of the equipment concerned or, where applicable, the cost of repair
Tá an paisinéir i dteideal luach ionaid an trealaimh lena mbaineann a fháil nó, sa chás gur cuí, íocaíocht a fháil as costas an deisithe
Ships licensed to carry more than 12 passengers are required to have insurance in place or some other form of financial security to cover liabilities up to 250,000 SDRs per passenger

Tá ar longa ag a bhfuil ceadúnas chun breis agus 12 phaisinéir a iompar árachas nó foirm éigin eile d’urrús airgeadais a bheith i bhfeidhm chun íoc as dliteanais a mhéid le 250,000 SDR in aghaidh an phaisinéara
For war and terrorism insurance the cover is limited to the lower of 250,000 SDRs per passenger or 340 million SDRs per ship
I gcás árachas cogaidh agus sceimhlitheoireachta, bíonn teorainn ar an gcumhdach go dtí faoi bhun 250,000 SDR in aghaidh an phaisinéara nó 340 milliún SDR in aghaidh na loinge
A claim for compensation may be brought directly against the insurer
Féadtar éileamh ar chúiteamh a thabhairt go díreach i gcoinne an árachóra
The carrier must ensure that passengers are informed clearly and precisely of their rights under this Regulation
Ní mór don iompróir a chinntiú go gcuirtear paisinéirí ar an eolas go soiléir agus go cruinn faoina gcearta faoin Reachtaíocht seo
The information must be provided in the most appropriate format:
Ní mór an fhaisnéis a chur ar fáil san fhormáid is oiriúnaí:
• At all points of sale, including by telephone and via the Internet where the contract of carriage is signed in a member state
• Ag gach pointe díola, lena n-áirítear tríd an nguthán agus tríd an Idirlíon, sa chás go sínítear an conradh iompair i mBallstát
• Prior to departure where the place of departure is in a member state
• Roimh imeacht, sa chás go bhfuil an áit imeachta i mBallstát
• Upon departure in all other cases
• Ar imeacht i ngach cás eile
You must give written notice to the carrier of loss or damage to luggage which is apparent:
Ní mór duit fógra i scríbhinn a thabhairt d’iompróir maidir le caillteanas bagáiste nó bagáiste a ndearnadh díobháil dó, ar dhealraitheach:
• Before or at the time of disembarkation of the passenger for cabin luggage
• Roimh nó ag tráth fágála an phaisinéara chun a b(h)agáiste cábáin a fháil
• Before or at the time of its re-delivery for all other luggage
• Roimh nó ag tráth a athsheachadta i gcás gach bagáiste eile

Where the damage to or loss of luggage is not apparent, written notice must be given within 15 days from the date of disembarkation or re-delivery or from the time when such re-delivery should have taken place

Sa chás nach dealraitheach gur cailleadh bagáiste nó go ndearnadh díobháil dó, ní mór fógra i scríbhinn a thabhairt laistigh de 15 lá ó dháta fágála na loinge nó an athsheachadta nó ón tráth inar cheart go ndearnadh an t-athsheachadadh sin
There is no need to give notice in writing if the condition of the luggage was the subject of joint inspection when you received it
Ní gá fógra i scríbhinn a thabhairt má bhí an bhail a bhí ar an mbagáiste ina hábhar comhiniúchta nuair a fuair tú é
Any court action to claim compensation arising out of the death of or personal injury to a passenger or for the loss of or damage to luggage must be taken within 2 years
Ní mór aon chaingean chúirte chun cúiteamh a éileamh a eascraíonn as bás nó gortú pearsanta paisinéara nó as caillteanas bagáiste nó díobháil a dhéanamh do bhagáiste laistigh de 2 bhliain
